translations: v．（俚语）猛击，撞击；（复数形式）
· He conks the ball with his head.

sentences.sentence: Grandad usually conks out for an hour or so after lunch.
sentences.translation: 爷爷吃过午饭往往要睡一个小时左右。

sentences.sentence: My DVD player conks out almost everyday. I need to buy a new one.
sentences.translation: 我的DVD 播放机每天都会坏，我需要买一个新的。
